body:
Comment 2: 
looks like findgoversion function in cmd/dist/build.c always return the last
weekly./release./go. tag:

% hg clone https://code.google.com/p/go
% cd go/src
% hg update weekly.2012-02-22
% ./all.bash
[ignored output]
% go version
go version weekly.2012-03-04 +96bd78e7d35e
% go update weekly.2012-03-04
% ./all.bash
[ignored output]
% go version
go version weekly.2012-03-04 +f4470a54e6db

the rev changes, but the tag does not.
